item.title: SNAP benefits: Trump admin seeks emergency block on order to pay food stamps in full

item.title: SNAP benefits must be fully paid by Trump administration by Friday, judge orders

item.title: DC sandwich thrower Sean Dunn found not guilty of assaulting federal agent
item.description: Former DOJ employee Sean Dunn was charged with tossing a Subway sandwich at a federal officer who had been deployed to Washington by President Trump.

item.title: Nancy Pelosi announces retirement from Congress
item.description: Pelosi, who represented California for decades, made history as the first female speaker of the House of Representatives.
